title: Grey: A Roguelike Game
description: This is a roguelike game developed by me as my Final Project in College. This game is a study case for algorithm implementation Cellular Automata. The world in this game is fully procedurally generated without any templates. There are 2 dungeons in this game and 2 Dungeon Boss for you to fight. Upgradde you character to make it easier beating the game!

title: Emak vs Anak
description: This is game I made for Global Game Jam 2018 in Surabaya. This game is inspired by Overcooked, but in a different twist. Rather than cooperating to finish the task like in Overcooked, this game is about a child disturbing his mother doing her house chores. The child win if the mother can't finish the task in time, and the mother win if she can finish the task in time. This game is local multiplayer game.

title: 3D Puzzle Game ECOFLIP
description: Finalist of GEMASTIK XI. 3D puzzle game for android. Unique gameplay and puzzle mechanic. Created using Unity Game Engine

title: Auto Route Controller Express JS
description: This is a library for ExpressJS to add dynamic routing based on your controller. Can adapt to any types of architecture, as long as it is modular. Can be used in non-modular architecture with slight changes

title: Inspection Training of Life Saving Appliance VR
description: A virtual reality application for android. Used to train person for inspecting live saving appliance of a ship, so trainees don't have to wait for a ship to dock in a harbor to inspect. Created using Unity Game Engine and Google Cardboard SDK

title: VR Eco Sky Car
description: Driving simulation using Virtual Reality. Using OVR library so it can be used in various Head Mounted Display. Controlled by steering wheel to create immersive experience. Created using Unity Game Engine

title: XPLORIA Jogja Istimewa
description: An AR application to help give tourist an interactive information provider about Jogja's tourism places. The application uses image tracking so it needs a marker for the AR object to spawn.

title: Gama Cardiac AR
description: An AR application to study the anatomy of heart. The learning mode has an AR mode so that you can freely look at the 3D heart that is approved by the doctor to be precise, but you don't need to always scan the marker so you can study anywhere. There is Quiz mode so you can test your knowledge about the heart anatomy. There are 3 levels available, Beginner, Intermediate, and Advance

title: Kardinah Virtual Xperience
description: An AR app in collaboration with Kardinah Hospital in Tegal, Indonesia. It has two main function that is giving an interactive information about the hospital and giving navigation inside the building. So you can choose a destination room and then scan the marker available in the hospital to search for a direction.
